page.title: 03 BALLUMBIE
page.content: In 1684,{Ballumbie Castle}was described as "one old,ruinous, demolished house but a very pleasant place." This statement is still true in 1985. In 1885 a new mansion house was built next to the castle. This mansion house is also in ruins now, due to a serious fire. Many stories are told about the area but the most famous ,is the story of{Mary Catherine {Douglas.}She used her arms to bolt the castle door against King James 1st enemies,giving him time to escape.This heroine later married Alexander Lovel of Ballumbie.The driveway to the house is lined with beautiful rhododendron bushes.
